attributes.action: Stop French Navy helping illegal immigrants into UK waters
attributes.additional_details:
The numbers of illegal migrants is causing a severe strain on local populations and financial budgets.  It needs decisive action and not only words.

Local populations partcularly on the channel coast are badly affected. They need to spend more of their local budget on housing and schooling, because of the infux.
attributes.background: To debate in Parliament the illegal actions of French Navy and the return illegal migrants to France

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862
